intro: Gnome hunting reaches a new level!
description:
Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a gloomy medieval dark fantasy and try to find all the gnomes.
Meet various characters on your way and try to figure out what happened to this damned world that you yourself (in fact, we) created.

Game Features
- Fancy low-poly style that keeps things cool — literally
- The opportunity to explore the forest well in search of gnomes and feel like a real knight
- A specific goal of the game that you choose yourself
- Procedurally generated world and high replayability
- Five levels, five gnomes, nine story characters
- Six endings depending on your decision
- Unexpected plot twists
- A REAL opportunity to FINALLY find the gnomes
- A feeling of personal involvement in an iconic world event
- Low price matches the level of content's quality
